title: Housewives: Kids Off Limits? + Gary Janetti (Author)
itunes:title: Housewives: Kids Off Limits? + Gary Janetti (Author)
description:
Danny explores the age old Housewives questions...are the kids of Housewives off limits? And how much should these shows feature the husbands? Then Danny sits down with author of Start Without Me, Gary Janetti, to talk about his new book, gay representation, TV writing, and more!


Gary Janetti Interview: 19:00ish


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
